fields.name: Mechanism
fields.description: Underlying cause(s) of covid-19 infections and transmission & possible drug mechanism of action

fields.name: Transmission
fields.description: Characteristics and modes of covid-19 transmissions, such as human-to-human

fields.name: Diagnosis
fields.description: Disease assessment through symptoms, test results, and radiological features

fields.name: Treatment
fields.description: Treatment strategies, therapeutic procedures, and vaccine development

fields.name: Prevention
fields.description: Prevention, control, response and management strategies

fields.name: Epidemic Forecasting
fields.description: Modelling and estimating the trend of covid-19 spread
